seed.notes: Multiple anchor witnesses in probe-op-structure; present in canonical sys:sample decode (tag 7). Structural coverage ok; runtime to be refreshed.
Nearby static-only candidate riding the same path ops/profiles as seed0; added to exercise atlas growth. No runtime probe yet.
xattr appears in sys:bsd (tag 26) and field2 inventory; runtime probes use file-read-xattr/file-write-xattr against /private/tmp fixtures.
file-mode appears in sys:bsd (tag 27) and sys:sample (tags 3/8); runtime probes use a file-read* discriminator over /private/tmp mode fixtures.
ipc-posix-name appears in sys:bsd and sys:airlock; userland probes can use shm_open/sem_open and sandbox_check for decision oracles.
Global-name appears on multiple anchors (mach + path probes) and in sys:bsd tag 27; runtime backed by mach-lookup traces on this host.
local-name appears in mach probe profiles; no system profile witness in the current field2 inventory.
Local (mach/socket) has multiple anchor witnesses, including a blocked flow-divert path; present in sys:sample tags 3/7/8. Runtime probes exist for mach/local combos; reuse them here.
right-name appears in sys:bsd; runtime backing can use authorization-right-obtain with sandbox_check callouts.
preference-domain appears in sys:bsd; userland preference reads/writes can be paired with sandbox_check callouts.
notification-name appears in sys:airlock tags 18-30; hardened runtime notification probes provide runtime signatures.
sysctl-name has no system-profile witness in the current inventory; hardened sysctl probes provide runtime signatures.
xpc-service-name has no system-profile witness in the current inventory; runtime backing is expected via sandbox_check on mach-lookup.

anchors.notes: Triple-only: domain+type+proto; tag0 u16_role=filter_vocab_id; literal com.apple.flow-divert

seed.notes: Characterized static token for flow-divert triples (domain+type+proto) on tag0 with literal com.apple.flow-divert; derived from flow-divert-2560 matrix decode. No runtime witness; world-scoped.
